summary: My first mod :) - A rather sizable player home with a small story behind it.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at using the creation kit but i think it went well :) please leave a comment/feedback as I would like to know how others felt about it or if anyone would like some improvements made, Thanks.

This is a Player house mod where a long lost temple built by the Dwemer and has recently come to the attention of Savos Aren, although he will not share such secrets. It is up to you to find this temple and claim it for yourself!

Features:
- All working shrines
- One custom blessing in the bedchamber
- All crafting areas with storage
- Study with working bookshelves
- Large armoury
- Bar
- Mini story
- Respawnable chests (storage room only - not crafting area storage) 
- Epic-ness

I have NOT actually scripted a quest but have made some notes/books to guide you along, you should already know where to get the first one *cough*ArensQuarters*cough*.

 If you still have trouble finding the abode or getting in, please read: Help file.txt

Please note: there will more than likely be bugs (it\'s my first try) so please let me know of them so I can try and fix them.

Changes:

--- 1.11 ---
- Map marker not visible by default

--- 1.10 ---
- Change in entrance location*
- Added map marker for new location
- small aesthetic changes
- Fixed some minor bugs

* You have to actually go through the dungeon in order to get access. 

Install:

Put the DovahkiinsAbode.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder and enable it on Data Files on the launcher.

Uninstall:

Delete the DovahkiinsAbode.esp from your Skyrim/Data folder.

You can do whatever you want with this mod all I ask is that you credit me if you upload it somewhere else/change it a little :)

Thanks!
author: LordMCG
